contentrichtext.text: '''Elizabeth Allen''', '''Eliza Allen''', '''Liz Allen''' or '''Beth Allen''' may refer to: *[[Eliza Allen Houston]] (1809–1861), first wife of Tennessee governor Sam Houston *[[Eliza Allen Starr]] (1824–1901), American artist known for her Catholic art *[[Eliza Allen]] (1826–?), American memoirist *[[Elizabeth Chase Allen]] (1832–1911), American poet, journalist and author *[[Elizabeth Allen (actress)]] (1929–2006), American stage, film and television performer *[[Liz Allen]] (born 1969), Irish writer *[[Elizabeth Anne Allen]] (born 1970), American actress *[[Elizabeth Allen (director)]] (born 1974), American film director, screenwriter and instructor *[[Beth Allen]] (born 1984), New Zealand stage, film and, primarily, television actress ==Characters== *Liz Allen, more frequently rendered as [[Liz Allan]], love interest of Marvel Comics hero Peter Parker, alias Spider-Man ==See also== *[[Elizabeth Allan]] (1910–1990), English stage, film and television actress *{{Lookfrom}} {{hndis|Allen, Elizabeth}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Allen, Elizabeth}}
